item.description:
* Between 5:30pm -7:00pm, we will be meeting in the bar area at Eastern Standard, which is in Kenmore Square near the House of Blues. I will be there by 6:00pm. Meet us there if you can, or find us at the venue. I'll send out my contact info the day before the event to people who have RSVP'd "Yes".
http://www.easternsta...


If you haven't listened to this young artist from Scotland, you're missing out on one of the most talented newcomers in decades. Paolo Nutini, is a star in the making, with qualities similar to that of an early Al Green. Two of his most popular songs on the radio now are "Last Request" and "New Shoes". He has an amazing voice, and great energy on stage.
http://www.last.fm/mu...

He will be playing at the House of Blues, on Lansdown St, on July 24th.

* Opening Artists *:

Erin McCarley
http://www.last.fm/mu...

Mat Hires
http://www.last.fm/mu...

* Advanced ticket purchase is recommended, as this is likely to sell out *

The tickets are $22. It's General Admission. No assigned seating.

To buy tickets (This show is likely to sell out, so buy your ticket ASAP if you're interested in going)
http://www.houseofblu...

* Please indicate in your RSVP if you have purchased your ticket *

For more info about Paolo, and to listen to his music:
http://www.last.fm/mu...

* This event is also listed with the Social Fun Group and the Beantown and Beyond Singles Group. So, please only RSVP "yes" or "maybe" on one of the groups. Thanks
item.how_to_find_us: I will e-mail my contact info prior to the show
item.name: Paolo Nutini at House of Blues
